message.content: {"id": "2940", "title": "Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)", "description": "The process of updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature is taking a long time, around 30 seconds in my case. During this process, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the system is busy. Not displaying the busy cursor makes it difficult for users to understand the progress of the operation.", "OB": "The updated state of checkboxes should be reflected in a timely manner when using the Export Zip feature.", "EB": "A busy cursor should be displayed during the updating process of the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature.", "SR": "Improve the efficiency of updating checkboxes and display a busy cursor to provide visual feedback to the user during the process."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'It takes a log time ( 30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table Busy cursor should be shownNOTES: ', 'SR': ''}
